recommended_degree: Desain Grafis, Desain Komunikasi Visual, Ilmu Komunikasi, Teknik Multimedia Digital (Sarjana)
job_description:
Responsibilities:
- Assist in creating visual designs for marketing materials, social media content, and branding assets
- Support the design of simple sales materials such as price lists or basic product packaging needs
- Help maintain consistency in brand visuals across different platforms
- Collaborate with marketing, product, and content teams to turn ideas into visual outputs
- Create simple drafts, mood boards, and design concepts based on briefs
- Assist in producing basic video edits using CapCut or similar tools
- Conduct simple research on current design trends and competitor visuals
- Help prepare final files for digital and print formats
- Revise designs based on feedback while maintaining quality
- Support various creative tasks as needed within the team
- Updated with current design trends, especially modern, minimalist, elegant, and aesthetic styles
- Able to work in a team, follow directions well, and manage simple project timelines
- Willing to learn new tools, take feedback, and grow in a fast-paced environment

Qualifications:
- Bachelor degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communication Design, Multimedia, or related field
- Fresh graduates are welcome; having a portfolio (class projects/personal works allowed) is a strong plus
- Basic proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere, After Effects, CapCut, or Canva
- Creative, detail-oriented, and eager to learn and improve design skills
- Good understanding of basic layout, typography, and color combinations
- Able to communicate in English (basic level is acceptable)
- Able to take video from smartphone properly 
- Able to operate a camera is a plus
